idea: The companies is innovating a protector from bacteria on toilet seats by using as human wear. The barrier layer material used can be tissue paper / general fabric / antimicrobial fabric / antimicrobial fiber cloth / plastic / polyethylene / etc. A wide variety of materials can be used to construct the product. This would provide employment for manufacturing this product as well as high sales volumes.
name: CAETECHFIX TECHNOLOGIES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Saino.io is B2B focused startup, which coming up with Unified & Innovative Marketing Solutions in the products like SMS, Email, Voice channels with Strong Tracking where the customer will be getting a complete ROI and can maximize its Brand reachability and can scale the business at very low cost. The Major problem solved by Saino First is the connectivity with major countries of the world and the tracking of their spends where the companies can communicate to its customers not only in India but in other countries also and maximize its brand awareness. This is possible under one Unified Solution only. Customer gets all marketing channel at one place which makes it very cost-effective. This is a startup for the startups.
name: SAINO FIRST NETWORK PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: PRODUCT IMPROVEMENT WITH LATEST REQUIREMENT IN MARKET  WITH SCALABLE MEASURES APPLICABLE TO STANDRED MARKET, THE SERVICE WE PROVIDE IN MARKET WITH STANDRED MEASURES APPLYED ,THE PROCESS OF SERVICE AND PRODUCT WITH INNOVATIVE AND APPLICABLE TO STANDRED MARKET.which covers areas such as farming, mining and fishing; and the secondary sector which covers manufacturing and making things. The service sector provides a service, not an actual product that could be held in your hand.
